attributes.action: Make it law for all teddy bears to be named mohammed from this day forward
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You cannot be seen to agree with this i know but of course you do in your heart of hearts

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
